title: Two eight bravo
creator_credit: James M. Olsson, Grahame Jennings Productions and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: An army recruitment film which captures the drama of battle. A tank hits a land-mine in Vietnam, and we follow the journey of the crippled tank back to Australia where repairs begin. Young Army apprentices, in training, learn how to repair tanks, aircraft and modern equipment.
creator_credit_for_label: James M. Olsson, Grahame Jennings Productions and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
